events.message: I ordered a pair of shoes last week, but they arrived the wrong size and I want to request a refund immediately.
The issue was identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect size product.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle your refund request for the incorrect shoe size.
Hello! I’m Emily from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the sizing issue. I will help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and upload a photo of the shoes showing the size label for verification?
Here is my order number 789456123 and I have attached photos of the shoes including the size tag as requested.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for your quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the prompt refund offer.
The refund case has been resolved. Your refund will be completed shortly. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
We are checking in to confirm you have received your refund successfully and to ensure your satisfaction with our service.
We are closing this case now. Feel free to reach out anytime if you have more questions or need assistance.
Please take a moment to fill our short survey to help us improve our customer service experience.
I completed the survey and was very satisfied with how quickly my refund was handled. Great support!
The refund case has been archived in the system as per standard retention policies.
